title: vanjanai paNNAdE
sahitya:
vanjanai paNNAdE pirarai varutti nI uNNAdE manamE


anupallavi

  anju bhUtamum uLLE �aDaDA tiruDA� enna akaTa vikaTam sheidE AlaiyE mATrAdE


caraNam    kannattil muttiTTuk-kaipporuL parikkAdE kAriyak-kaLLanAik-kAdalaip-pirikkAdE
unnaivilaip-paDuttip-ponnai vaNangAdE uLLE azhukku vaittu veLLai minukkAdE
